description: This Kotlin source file defines the ContentDetailsFragment class, a fragment used in an Android TV app based on the Leanback library. It displays detailed content information including a backdrop image with a horizontal gradient overlay for improved text contrast, content description, and action buttons for playing content, adding to watchlist, and casting. The class customizes the UI according to design specifications, loads images asynchronously with Glide, and handles user interactions with content actions.

classes.name: ContentDetailsFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays detailed information about a content item, including an image with overlay, description, and actions like play, watchlist, and cast, tailored for Android TV using Leanback.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of ContentDetailsFragment with a specified ContentItem.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets up UI components, assigns actions, and configures background.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Loads backdrop image asynchronously and applies a gradient overlay.

methods.name: applyHorizontalGradientOverlay
methods.description: Creates a drawable with a horizontal gradient overlay to improve text contrast over the backdrop image.
